title: What is physical fitness?
creator_credit: Eric Horter and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
brief_description: This film defines fitness and includes footage of high school student in action to demonstrates the five elements that constitute physical fitness: cardio-respiratory endurances, muscles endurance, flexibility and body composition. From the sereis “Fitness for living”.
creator_credit_for_label: Eric Horter and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
